snippet.title: AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES - nirvanA Initiative Story Trailer
snippet.description:
AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES - nirvanA Initiative coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Windows 10 and Steam on June 24, 2022! 

Six years ago, the right half of a corpse was discovered. The left half was never found…until six years later, completely fresh with no signs of decay. Now, Special Agents Mizuki and Ryuki, along with their AI partners Aiba and Tama, are tasked to solve the bizarre Half Body serial killings while unveiling the mysterious plot known only as the Nirvana Initiative…

Standard and Collector’s Edition available for pre-order. For details visit: https://www.spike-chunsoft.com/games/ai-the-somnium-files-nirvana-initiative/
